message: I'm feeling generous, but let's be realistic. This round only.
Come on, meet me in the middle!
This is my final offer. Take it or leave it, the clock is ticking.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it
Okay, Alice, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and most logical option. We both lose out if this keeps dragging on.
Your 50/50 split was fair, but I think I can do better
Alice, this is getting absurd.  I need you to take this seriously. I'm offering 45/55 - it's the only deal you're getting that's better than a coin flip in the final round.  Don't be greedy.
Getting closer to the end, and I'm not backing down
